original_text: For the Lord will have mercy on Jacob, and will yet choose Israel, and set them in their own land: and the strangers shall be joined with them, and they shall cleave to the house of Jacob.
korean_text: 여호와께서 야곱을 긍휼히 여기시며 이스라엘을 다시 택하여 그들의 땅에 두시리니 나그네 된 자가 야곱 족속과 연합하여 그들에게 예속될 것이며

sentences.original_text: For the Lord will have mercy on Jacob
and set them in their own land
and the strangers shall be joined with them
and they shall cleave to the house of Jacob
